body_html:
@tfboyd
I think I managed to compile from source with mkl on my ubuntu machine, but it turned out to be much slower then the maven build, (about 6 times slower with mkl).
does it make sense to you, since I didn't optimize as you said?

you will need to set some environment variables as well as use the desired data format NCHW

Anyway, can you refer me to your post that you said you were working on? or even the drafts (if you didn't publish it yet)
Thanks ahead!

body:
@tfboyd 
I think I managed to compile from source with mkl on my ubuntu machine, but it turned out to be much slower then the maven build, (about 6 times slower with mkl).
does it make sense to you, since I didn't optimize as you said?
> you will need to set some environment variables as well as use the desired data format NCHW

Anyway, can you refer me to your post that you said you were working on? or even the drafts (if you didn't publish it yet)
Thanks ahead!
